content: 2 sts sl1 p1 psso next row seed stitch next row knit all stitches repeat last 2 row until 13 sts remain on needle next row p2tog purl to last 2 sts sl1 p1 psso next row k7 k2tog ssk k7 16 sts remain head work in straight stockinette stitch for 2 ending next row co 2 sts to tip of needle seed stitch to after a purl row end of row next row k6 k2tog ssk k6 next row repeat row above work in straight stockinette stitch for 1 ending next row kfb seed stitch to end after a purl row next row seed stitch next row k5 k2tog ssk k5 repeat the last 2 row once knit 5 row straight stockinette stitch next 2 row seed stitch next row k4 k2tog ssk k4 next row kfb seed stitch to last st kfb 21 sts knit 5 row straight stockinette stitch next row seed stitch next row k3 k2tog ssk k3 next row k2tog seed stitch to end knit 5 row straight stockinette stitch next 3 row seed stitch next row k2 k2tog ssk k2 6 sts remain next row k2tog seed stitch until 2 sts before knit 4 row straight stockinette stitch end ssk cast off next row seed stitch repeat the last 2 row until 12 sts remain cast off make another piece exactly the same head gusset ears with brown yarn co 3 sts with brown yarn co 3 sts row 1-3 k1 p1 k1 row 1 seed stitch row 4 kfb p1 kfb row 2 kfb k1 kfb row 5-7 seed stitch row 3-9 seed stitch row 8 kfb seed st to last st kfb row 10 kfb seed st to last st kfb repeat row 5-8 two more times 11 stitches row 11-17 seed stitch work in straight seed stitch for 2 row 18 kfb seed st to last st kfb next row k2tog seed st until 2 sts before end row 19-25 seed stitch ssk row 26 kfb seed st to last st kfb 11 stitches next 3 row seed stitch work in straight seed st until entire ear measures repeat the last 4 row until 3 sts remain 6 work 3 row straight seed stitch cast off cast off make another ear exactly the same front legs with brown yarn co 20 sts work in straight seed stitch for 2 cast off make another leg exactly the same finishing join back seams from bottom to back of head insert the white belly piece and seam to side pieces leaving opening for stuffing at base insert head gusset and seam to white piece in the front and sides of head it may help to pin or baste the head gusset in place before seaming stuff whole body from base and seam opening fold front legs in half lengthwise and stitch edges together gathering the seam slightly to shape the leg stuff and sew to body cut canvas in pieces which are slightly smaller
